result.title: Updated EES market database
result.description: By M29 a second round of the EES market survey (Task 2.1) will be conducted to create a D2.6 updated EES market database, which is a part of the QualitEE webpage. The questionnaire (D2.2) will be amended if needed to reflect results from the first round and new potential information. Longer term sustainability of the database will be sought through partnerships with strategic partners - mainly European organisations.
